comment: ANGSD configuration for SNP calling and genotype likelihood calculation
comment_usage: Parameters organized by ANGSD functional groups

basic_options.comment: Basic filtering and data handling options
basic_options.comment_remove_bads: 1=Remove reads with FLAG issues (unmapped, duplicates, QC fail)
basic_options.comment_only_proper_pairs: 1=Only use properly paired reads for paired-end data
basic_options.comment_trim: Number of bases to trim from start/end of reads
basic_options.comment_C: Adjust base quality for excessive mismatches (50=default penalty)
basic_options.comment_baq: 1=Enable BAQ (Base Alignment Quality) computation to reduce false SNPs near indels
basic_options.comment_doCounts: 1=Count alleles at each site (required for most downstream analyses)

filters.comment_minQ: Minimum base quality score (Phred scale, 20=99% accuracy)
filters.comment_minMapQ: Minimum mapping quality score (20=99% confidence in mapping position)
filters.comment_minInd: Minimum number of individuals required to have data at a site
filters.comment_setMinDepth: Minimum total depth across all samples
filters.comment_setMaxDepth: Maximum total depth to avoid repetitive regions
filters.comment_setMinDepthInd: Minimum reads per individual to include them at a site
filters.comment_setMaxDepthInd: Maximum reads per individual to avoid PCR duplicates/errors

genotype_likelihoods.comment_doPost: Posterior genotype probability: 0=none, 1=use HWE prior, 2=use estimated allele freq
genotype_likelihoods.comment_geno_minDepth: Minimum depth required to call a genotype (only used when doGeno>0)
genotype_likelihoods.comment_geno_minMM: Minimum posterior probability to call a genotype (0.1=10% confidence threshold)

snp_calling.comment_doMajorMinor: How to infer major/minor alleles: 1=from GL, 2=from counts, 3=use reference, 4=use ancestral, 5=effective major/minor
snp_calling.comment_doMaf: Calculate allele frequencies: 0=none, 1=known major/minor, 2=known ancestral, 3=EM algorithm
snp_calling.comment_SNP_pval: P-value threshold for SNP calling (1e-6 = standard, 1=no filtering)
snp_calling.comment_skipTriallelic: 1=Skip processing of tri-allelic sites entirely (faster than rmTriallelic)
snp_calling.comment_minMaf: Minimum minor allele frequency to keep a site (0.01=1%)

pooled_sequencing.comment_is_pooled: Set to true if analyzing pooled samples
pooled_sequencing.comment_n_individuals_per_pool: Number of individuals per pool (for pooled sequencing)
pooled_sequencing.comment_doSaf: Site allele frequency likelihood: 0=none, 1=calculate SAF, 2=calculate SFS
pooled_sequencing.comment_anc: Path to ancestral sequence file (for unfolded SFS)

output_options.comment_dumpCounts: Output allele counts: 0=none, 1=total counts, 2=counts per sample, 3=both
